com.example.taskmagic

Class FireBaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.taskmagic.FireBaseManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OnGetAllTaskReqListener, OnGetAssignedTaskListener, OnGetATaskListener, OnGetBidsListListener, OnGetChatMessagesListener, OnGetMyTaskListener, OnGetUserInfoListener

    public class FireBaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements OnGetMyTaskListener, OnGetUserInfoListener, OnGetAllTaskReqListener, OnGetATaskListener, OnGetBidsListListener, OnGetAssignedTaskListener, OnGetChatMessagesListener
    Created by hyusuf on 2018-03-08.

    • Constructor Summary

      FireBaseManager(com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseAuth user, android.content.Context context)
      Constructor creates a manager that handles upload and download to database
